card_text: "The Weather" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zones of this card's column and its adjacent columns gain this effect.$N‚óèYou can banish this card (Quick Effect); add 1 "The Weather" card from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot add cards from your Deck to your hand for the rest of this turn, except by drawing them.$NYou can only control 1 "The Weather Snowy Canvas".
